release.action: Not possible to store an empty directory in Payload.
Package naming changed to org.osjava from com.generationjava.
Paylets added. Plugins to create custom behaviour at extraction time.

release.description: Recurses into archives in archives for interpolation.
release.action: Commenting out the setting of compressed-size. it causes problems and seems unnecessary.
Supports regular expression matching for archives too.
Jarring on Windows puts in backslashes. Now uses slashes always.
Allow more than one .properties file to be passed in.
Files to interpolate may now be specified.
Self-extracting jars are built with the payload jar.
The self-extracting jar then unpacks itself into a directory with the same name as the jar.
A properties file may be specified for interpolation on .txt and .xml files.
